_comment: Kernel event: Deal approved by GP - transitions from UnderReview to Approved
_type_comment: This is a GATED event - requires authority validation and material requirements
_actorId_comment: UUID of the GP who approved the deal

payload._comment: Approval-specific data with required context fields
payload._dealId_comment: UUID of the deal being approved - required for traceability
payload._orgId_comment: Organization ID - required for multi-tenant isolation
payload._timestamp_comment: ISO timestamp of approval - required for audit trail
payload.approvalNotes: All underwriting materials verified and approved

authorityContext._comment: Authority rules that permitted this approval
authorityContext._role_comment: Must be GP to approve (per authority rules)
authorityContext._overrideReason_comment: If not null, this approval bypassed normal material requirements

_evidenceRefs_comment: Artifact UUIDs that support this approval - linked to UnderwritingSummary material
